amendment.description: An amendment numbered 57 printed in Part C of House Report 118-559 to prohibit any funds from being spent to compensate the Department of Veteran Affairs for processing medical claims on behalf of individuals detained by Immigration and Customs Enforcement.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Steube amendment (A029) Agreed to by recorded vote: 235 - 176 (Roll no. 294).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Steube amendment (A029) Agreed to by recorded vote: 235 - 176 (Roll no. 294).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
